DOC.brief_summary: Reducing tissue hypoxia ultimate goal severe sepsis septic shock therapy.Venoarterial PCO2 difference /arteriovenous O2 content difference ratio ( △PCO2/Ca-vO2 ) consider good indicator global anaerobic metabolism.The purpose study compare efficacy △PCO2/Ca-vO2 central venous oxygen saturation ( ScvO2 ) treatment severe sepsis septic shock .
